parentFolderPath.description: The relative URL of the parent folder where the new folder will be created.

name.description: The name of the new folder to create.

shortDelay.description: Short delay between item additions in milliseconds.

retryAfterMs.description: Interval between retry attempts in milliseconds.

attempts.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for adding items.

layoutType.description: The layout type to be applied to the title area.

listIdentity.description: The List Identity where the pages are located.

contentTypeIdentity.description: Content Type Identity to filter pages.

retryAfterMs.description: Interval between retry attempts in milliseconds.

shortDelay.description: Short delay between operations in milliseconds.

id.description: The GUID of the content type in format without dashes.

group.description: The group the content type belongs to.

description.description: The description of the content type.

parentContentTypeId.description:
The ID of the parent content type.

Examples of base content type IDs:
- Item: 0x01
- Document: 0x0101
- Event: 0x0102
- Task: 0x0108
- Message: 0x0107

You can also use IDs of custom content types if you are creating a child content type.

name.description: The name of the content type.

attempts.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for adding fields.

updateChildren.description: Flag to indicate whether to update child content types. Works only for latest versions. for 1.7.0 version updated by default

retryAfterMs.description: Interval between retry attempts in milliseconds.

shortDelay.description: Short delay between field additions in milliseconds.

fieldInternalNames.description: Array of field internal names to be ensured.

attempts.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for adding items.

retryAfterMs.description: Interval between retry attempts in milliseconds.

fieldInternalNames.description: Array of field internal names to be ensured.

termNames.description: Array of term names to be created.

maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for term creation.

termGroupName.description: The name of the term group.

retryInterval.description: Interval between retry attempts in milliseconds.

termSetName.description: The name of the term set.

shortDelay.description: Short delay between page publishing in milliseconds.

retryAfterMs.description: Interval between retry attempts in milliseconds.

attempts.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for publishing pages.

contentTypeIdentity.description: The identifier of the content type of the items to be published.

lookupFieldInternalNames.description: Internal name of the lookup fields in the source list that need to be reflected to the target list.

contentTypeIdentity.description: Content type identity of the items in the source list.

targetListIdentity.description: The identity of the target list to which the lookup values will be reflected.

targetContentTypeIdentity.description: Content type identity of the items in the target list.

targetLookupFieldName.description: Internal name of the lookup field in the target list that will store the reflected lookup value from the source list.

listIdentity.description: The identity of the source list from which the lookup values are taken.

attempts.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for removing fields.

doNotUpdateChildren.description: Do not update child content types.

retryAfterMs.description: Interval between retry attempts in milliseconds.

shortDelay.description: Short delay between field removals in milliseconds.

requiredFieldInternalNames.description: Array of field internal names to be set as required.

Short delay between field updates in milliseconds.

attempts.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for indexing fields.

retryAfterMs.description: Interval between retry attempts in milliseconds.

indexedFieldInternalNames.description: Array of field internal names to be indexed.

permissions.description:
Choose a permission level:

Full Control: Has full control.
Design: Can view, add, update, delete, approve, and customize.
Edit: Can add, edit and delete lists; can view, add, update and delete list items and documents.
Contribute: Can view, add, update, and delete list items and documents.
Read: Can view pages and list items and download documents.

You can also provide a custom permission level.

groupTitle.description:
Choose a group title or provide a custom one:

{{AssociatedOwnerGroup}}: Default owner group.
{{AssociatedMemberGroup}}: Default member group.
{{AssociatedVisitorGroup}}: Default visitor group.

ratingType.description: The type of rating for the list.

breakRoleInheritance.description: Break permissions inheritance from the parent.

enableCommenting.description: Flag to indicate if the comments are enabled

readSecurity.description:
Specifies the Read access level for items in the list. Options are: 
1 (All users have Read access to all items) 
2 (Users have Read access only to items they create).

ratingType.description: The type of rating for the list.

majorVersions.description: The number of major versions to keep.

writeSecurity.description:
Determines the Write permissions for items in the list. Options: 
1 (Write access to all items), 
2 (Write access only to own items), 
4 (No write access, read-only list).

copyRoleAssignments.description: Copy permissions from the parent when breaking inheritance.

hidden.description: Flag to indicate if the list is hidden from the user interface.

folderEnable.description: Flag to indicate if folder creation is enabled.

enableMinorVersions.description: Flag to indicate if minor versioning is enabled.

minorVersions.description: The number of minor versions to keep.

enableContentTypes.description: Flag to indicate if content types are enabled.

resetRoleInheritance.description: Reset permissions inheritance to inherit from the parent.

enableVersioning.description: Flag to indicate if versioning is enabled.

isDefault.description: Specifies whether the view is the default view.

rowLimit.description: Number of rows to be displayed in a page.

fields.description: Fields to be included in the view.

viewName.description: The name of the view. If not specified, the default view will be used.

appendFields.description: Specifies whether to append fields to the view or overwrite them.

isPersonal.description: Specifies whether the view is a personal view.

activeOnly.description: Optional.Include only active posts, or all. Default - all

contentTypeIdentity.description: Optional. The identifier of the content type to filter the items to be updated. If not specified, all items in the list will be updated.

listIdentity.description: The identifier (ID, Title, or Url) of the list where the items to be updated are located.
